attributes.action: Give permission for illegal migrants to stay legally because of the pandemic  ..
attributes.additional_details: Because this is the time for humanity.They don't have jobs which means they can’t pay rent and can’t afford basic needs food or shelter.If they get covid 19 then they would scared to go as they could be sent back.This also can spread the virus to others and can effect everyone.
attributes.background: We want them to give a legal paper so they can stay and help our society in the pandemic.
